code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:61 yo white female designer presents with 12 days history of mild difficulty seeing colors, especially blue. patient also reports mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather, mild constriction in eye field. o:Height 63 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

content2.Unmatched: patient also reports mild trouble seeing
foggy or rainy weather , mild constriction

td.content: s:patient presents with 8 months history of mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather, mild constriction in eye field and mild difficulty seeing colors, especially blue. she is a white F designer aged 62 yrs. denies any smoking patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 64 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

content2.Unmatched: foggy or rainy weather , mild constriction
